mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(*) > 0 , TRUE , FALSE) FROM ats_authentication WHERE email = #{email} AND DATE_ADD(created_datetime, INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) > NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ats_authentication ( authentication_key, email, expire_datetime, created_datetime ) VALUES ( #{authenticationKey}, #{email}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), NOW())
